cause.description:
President Bush has undergone many hardships as President such as ...
- 9/11 - Hurricane Katrina - The War on Terror - The War in Iraq - Immigration Reform
President Bush deserves our support and our gratitude, and above all he does NOT deserve blame for the wrongfuls precedents set by predessors such President Clinton or Carter.
FYI: I am not interested in anyones liberal bullshit, PLEASE speak factually so every comment can be maturely rebuttled.
1. President Bush has remained loyal to America's cause for fighting terrorism
2. President Bush has never flip-flopped on ANY position
3. President Bush ALWAYS has a plan
4. President Bush is prolife
5. President Bush is a devout Christian and American
6. President Bush has NOT forgotten 9/11 and all of its horrors, he realizes such a tragedy could happen again, but we must prevent it in all ways; at and abroad
7. President Bush is a leader of strength, his decisions are right, not made out of popularity
cause.mission: Enlighten the USA of The Honorable Bush Administration
cause.name: Support President Bush
